body.p: The IASB decided that the prohibition on reclassification should not prevent a derivative from being accounted for at fair value through profit or loss when it does not qualify for hedge accounting and vice versa. Consequently, in Improvements to IFRSs issued in May 2008, the IASB addressed this point (now in paragraph 4.4.3 of IFRS 9).
